title: The Remains Of 215 Indigenous Children Have Been Found At A Former School In Canada
content:
1. The Remains Of 215 Indigenous Children Have Been Found At A Former School In Canada  NPR
  2. Investigation underway after remains of 215 children found at BC residential school site  Global News
  3. Remains of 215 children found at former indigenous school site in Canada  Yahoo! Voices
  4. We grew up hearing horror stories of residential schools. The Kamloops children’s remains show — yet again — the truth of our peoples’ nightmare  Toronto Star
  5. 'Unthinkable' discovery in Canada as remains of 215 children found buried near residential school  CNN
